featured.text: These warm-up exercises are designed to help people _____ their muscles and prevent injuries.
The climate was warmer and more humid.
Using a heating pad or taking warm baths can sometimes help to _____ pain in the lower back.
16 , the man answered, “I come from Argos, and there the people are all friendly, generous, and warm-hearted.

other.text: 40 warm weather, sweating helps humans regulate their body temperature.
Fireflies, small beetles that live in many warmer parts of the world, use light to attract a mate.
The astronauts keep themselves warm in a space suit.
You might speed up healing time by gently pressing a warm washcloth 20 your eyelid for 10 minutes, 3 or 4 times a day.

definition.zh_def: 溫暖的，通常指氣溫或情感上的舒適感。
definition.en_def: Having a moderate degree of heat; also refers to a friendly or affectionate feeling.
definition.example: The warm sun made the day feel perfect for a picnic.
